alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 10:10PM CDT until May 08 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Deweyville. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:46 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 24.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:46 PM CDT Saturday was 24.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 24.2 Sat 9 pm CDT 23.9 23.5 23.1 &&
